Name: Epidote Ca_2(Al,Fe^3+)_3O.SiO_4.Si_2O_7.OH
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicate
Subclass: Sorosilicate
Particle Size: Coarse
Sample No.: SS-1A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VSWIR
Origin: Mexico, Baja California Norte, Valle De La Trinidad
Collection Date: N/A
Description: Particle size was 125-500um.Collected by Burminco Original ASTER Spectral Library name was jpl.beckman.mineral.silicate.sorosilicate.coarse.ss01a.spectrum.txt
Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units: Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:Reflectance (percent)

Last X Value:  2.5000
Number of X Values: 826
Additional Information: mineral.silicate.sorosilicate.coarse.vswir.ss-1a.jpl.beckman.ancillary.txt
